ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name ="Trinidad ICT&GSM - Standard User", $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator", $Profile.Name <>"Trinidad Business Solutions Manager", $UserRole.Name <>"Trinidad - SMB Manager", $UserRole.Name <>"Trinidad - SMB - BDE Manager 3", ISCHANGED(OwnerId) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permission to re-assign this Opportunity record. Please contact your Manager or System Administrator.
